body.name: RG Nano Retro Handheld Game Console, RG Nano Portable Game Console Mini Aluminum Alloy with 1.54 Inch IPS Screen 64G TF Card 5405 Games, Supports Clock Hi-fi Speaker Music Player Function (Blue)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 12 mins
features: 【RG Nano Handheld Game Console】Built-in 64G SD Card 5405 Games, supports over 10 game formats. Endless Entertainment Possibilities.

【Easy to Carry】RG Nano handheld game console with an aluminum alloy body makes RG Nano both stylish and durable. The console's dimensions are just 2.79 inches x 1.69 inches x 0.67 inches, and it weighs only 0.165 lb, allowing easy portability and comfortable use.

【Powerful and Smooth】Powered by an ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @ 1.2Ghz and 64MB DDR2 RAM, RG Nano offers smooth gameplay and fast loading times. The Linux-based system, along with 64G TF internal memory, provides a seamless user experience.
【Superior Audio and Video Performance】1.54-inch IPS full-fit screen with a resolution of 240x240 for crisp and clear visuals. Hi-fi speaker delivers immersive audio, enhancing your gaming experience.

【Battery Life & More Features】1050mAh battery provides up to 2.5 hours of continuous gaming. Supporting TF card expansion up to 512GB, a clock function, music player, game adding via computer connection, and a wise auto shutdown function. See description for more details and accessories.
body.description: Model: RG Nano Handheld Game ConsoleMaterial: aluminum alloy CNC processSystem: LINUXScreen: 1.54-inch IPS full-fit screen, resolution 240*240CPU: ARM Cortex-A7 @ 1.2GhzRAM: 64 MB DDR2Memory: 64G TF Games: PS1,Arcade,GBA,SFC,NES,PCE,GB,GBC,GG,MD,SMS,WSC,NGP,LYNX, and more than 10 kinds of format games.Support users to download games in related formats.Audio and video function: Support MP3, FLAC, Ogg and other music formats; support MP4, avi and other video formatsLanguage: Chinese/EnglishSpeaker: Hi-fi speakerBattery: Polymer lithium-ion battery 1050 mAh, lasting 2.5 hoursTF card: Support TF card expansion, up to 512GBOther functions : Support clock function; Music player function; Support connecting to the computer to add games; Wise auto shutdown function.Accessories: USB charging cable, Adapter cable for codec, keychain, giftbox, ueser manualBox specification: 11.6*8.5*2.5cm, 0.153kgConsole specification: 7.1*4.3*1.7cm, 0.075kg
